description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Bug Ball is a competitive volley ball style game for up to 4 Players on a single Xbox 360 or over Xbox Live! Choose from a variety of adorable bugs, each with their own beautiful 3D arena. Jump, Spike, Dash and Super Spike your way to victory! Who's the best Bug Ball player in the forest? It's time to find out!

It's time to find out!
